name: frontend_challenge
description: Imagine you work at a port and are in charge of vessel allocations. Each day, you are given a list of containers that need to be shipped and a list of vessels that are leaving that day. You need to assign the containers to those vessels so that they can get to their final destinations.

scripts.watch-css: npm run build-css && node-sass-chokidar src/ -o src/ --watch --recursive

author: Elifaz
